alert.note: Alert for Lee; Terrell; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 6:44PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lee, southeastern Terrell and northwestern Worth Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 643 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dawson, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dawson, Leesburg, Warwick, Sasser, Bronwood, Chokee, Bridges Crossroad, Century, Jordan Place, Dawson Municipal A/P, Starksville, Byne Crossroads, Scrutchins, Armena, Neyami, Philema, Chickasawhatchee, Mossy Dell and Oakfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
